_header: Love is life that lasts ay there it in Christ is fast
Note: A Text: Northern Version (24 stanzas); B Text: Southern Version (combined with 2854, which is here inserted between stanzas 17 and 18).
Subjects: Christ, love of; love, of Christ; translations; devotional treatises
_description: A song of the Love of Christ, a direct translation of Rolle’s Incendium Amoris, ch. xl, xli — in monorhyming quatrains with medial rhyme

CULDd564.First Lines:
lYf es lyf þat lastes ay þar it in criste es festeffor
                    wele ne wa it chaunge may als wryten hsmen wyseste…
CULDd564.Last Lines:
…Ihesu on vs now & ay for þe we halde oure keyngIhesu
                    gyf vs grace as þu wel may to luf þe withowten endyng
